    Facet FormOfPayment_Voucher

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:FormOfPayment_ID

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<FormOfPaymentVoucher xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" costCenterID="Example String Value" guaranteeID="Example String Value" guaranteeIndicatorInd="true" objID="formOfPayment_1" paymentTransactionTypeCode="charge" remark="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">
    <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
    <FormOfPaymentRef>formOfPayment_1</FormOfPaymentRef>
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
    <GuaranteeTypeCode>Air travel card</GuaranteeTypeCode>
    <Voucher billingNumber="234872648" effectiveDate="1999-07-16" electronicIndicatorInd="true" expireDate="2022-07-16" expireDateExclusiveInd="true" groupDaysApplyInd="true" identifier="voucher_1" organization="Acme" seriesCode="87462746283" supplierIdentifier="6473243874" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" valueType="Full"/>
    <BillingAccountName code="AI" codeContext="Example String Value" department="Adventure department" description="Example String Value" division="Travel Division" shortName="Adventure Inc">Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated</BillingAccountName>
    <ota2-0400:AddressSummary role="Home">
        <ota2-0400:AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</ota2-0400:AddressLine>
        <ota2-0400:BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</ota2-0400:BldgRoom>
        <ota2-0400:Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</ota2-0400:Number>
        <ota2-0400:Street>Travers Street</ota2-0400:Street>
        <ota2-0400:City>Dublin</ota2-0400:City>
        <ota2-0400:County>Fairfax</ota2-0400:County>
        <ota2-0400:StateProv name="Texas">TX</ota2-0400:StateProv>
        <ota2-0400:Country name="Ireland">IR</ota2-0400:Country>
        <ota2-0400:PostalCode>32165-9999</ota2-0400:PostalCode>
    </ota2-0400:AddressSummary>
</FormOfPaymentVoucher>

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Voucher
        A form of payment using a voucher or coupon.
        Details
        Type Voucher
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        BillingAccountName
        The name of the Billing Account for which the voucher has been issued.
        Details
        Type CompanyName
        Example Value Travel Adventure Partners Incorporated
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        AddressSummary
        The address of the Billing Account for which the voucher has been issued.
        Details
        Type Address_Summary
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
